unpublishedAction.name: All_details

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
tk.ticket_id,
tk.retailer_id,
tk.priority,
tk.new_code,
ret.retailer_name,
ret.contact,
ret.area_zone,
tk.ticket_status,
CAST(case when ticket_status='ASSIGNED' THEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (assigned_time)-created_time)/60 WHEN ticket_status='PICKED' THEN
EXTRACT( EPOCH FROM (picked_time)-assigned_time)/60
		 WHEN ticket_status='CLOSED' THEN
EXTRACT( EPOCH FROM (closed_time)-picked_time)/60
		 END AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as Time_spend,
TO_CHAR(tk.created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as created_time,
TO_CHAR(tk.assigned_time,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as assigned_time,
TO_CHAR(tk.picked_time,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')as picked_time,
TO_CHAR(tk.closed_time,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')as closed_time,
tk.issue_type,
tk.issues,
ag.agent_name,
ag.agent_id,
tk.other_agent,
ag.area_zone as Agent_Area_zone,
tk.resolution_type,
tk.resolution_remark,
tk.version,
tk.feedback_rating,
tk.feedback_remarks,
tk.created_by,
tk.reassigned_by,
tk.closed_by,
ret.status as Retailer_status
FROM ticket as tk
left join agent ag on ag.agent_id=tk.agent_id
left join retailer as ret on ret.retailer_code=tk.retailer_id
where 
to_char(tk.created_time ,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000') >=
to_char(date({{from_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000')  
and 
to_char(tk.created_time ,'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')<=
to_char(date({{to_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999') 
AND 
(case when coalesce({{reports_retailer_code.text}},'')='' then 1=1 else upper(tk.retailer_id)=upper(coalesce({{reports_retailer_code.text}},'')) end)
ORDER BY to_char(tk.created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') desc

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
